## üéØ Feature Requests Go in Discussions!

Thanks for your interest in improving PaperFlow!

**Please post feature requests in our [Discussions tab](https://github.com/solomonshalom/PaperFlow/discussions) instead of opening an issue.**

This helps us:

- Keep issues focused on bugs and actionable tasks
- Have more open-ended conversations about features
- Gather community feedback and input
- Better organize ideas and suggestions

### üî• Common Feature Requests

Before creating a new discussion, check if your request is already being discussed:

- **‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard Shortcuts / Hotkeys** - [Join Discussion #211](https://github.com/solomonshalom/PaperFlow/discussions/211)

### How to submit a new feature request:

1. Go to [Discussions](https://github.com/solomonshalom/PaperFlow/discussions)
2. Search to see if your idea already exists
3. Click "New discussion"
4. Choose the appropriate category (Ideas, Feature Requests, etc.)
5. Share your idea!
